required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Renal Nerve Denervation(RDN) and Renal Function
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of RDN on Renal Function
clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital of Xiamen University

brief_summary.textblock: Current studies have found the efficacy of RDN in the treatment of hypertension, however, the safety of RDN in renal function is still lacking. Therefore, the investigators are aimed to study the effect of RDN on renal function.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of serum creatinine and urea nitrogen before and after RDN operation
primary_outcome.description: Serum creatinine(umol/L, ammonia iminohydrolase assay)and urea nitrogen(umol/L, urease methods) were obtained by blood test.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes of glomerular filtration rate before and after RDN operation
primary_outcome.description: Glomerular filtration rate(ml/min) were obtained by ECT

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of RDN operation on renal artery
secondary_outcome.description: Renal arteries were observed by CT angiography.

secondary_outcome.measure: Urinary protein/serum creatinine ratio change before and after RDN operation
secondary_outcome.description: Urinary protein (mg/L, PRM assay) were tested by urine test.Serum creatinine(umol/L, ammonia iminohydrolase assay) were obtained by blood test.

clinical_study.condition: Effects of RDN on Renal Function

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: The First Affiliated Hospital of Xiamen University
